abstract.t: This document analyzes how Web Packaging may affect the web ecosystem. Note to Readers This document has NOT been reviewed widely and probably contains lots of mistakes. Discussion of this draft takes place on the wpack mailing list (wpack@ietf.org), which is archived at https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/wpack [1]. The source code and issues list for this draft can be found in https://github.com/jyasskin/wpack-ecosystem-effects [2].
